participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and driven, Emily has a strong sense of justice and a love for animals, particularly horses. She is determined to pursue a career in law and is passionate about making a difference.
participant_1.background: my family has raised horses for generations. i want to be a lawyer. i was raised on a horse farm. i am from a small town. i dream of moving to the city.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Relaxed and easygoing, Jake enjoys the thrill of racing and the camaraderie of friends. He is hardworking and appreciates the simple pleasures in life, especially good food and music.
participant_2.background: my favorite food is mexican food. i am a construction worker. in my free time i like to watch nascar racing and ufc. my favorite band is aerosmith.
